senses.sense_definition: The public transportation system in Toronto, Canada, including buses, streetcars, and subways; also refers to the organization that operates it (Toronto Transit Commission).

examples.text: I take the <w>TTC</w> to work every morning to avoid traffic.
The <w>TTC</w> has announced delays on the subway line due to maintenance.

senses.sense_definition: Acronym for 'trying to conceive', used to describe the active process of attempting to become pregnant.

examples.text: My husband and I have been <w>TTC</w> for over six months.
She joined an online support group for women who are <w>TTC</w>.

senses.sense_definition: Abbreviation for triphenyl tetrazolium chloride, a chemical substance used in scientific experiments to distinguish between living and dead tissue.

examples.text: The researchers used <w>TTC</w> staining to assess the viability of the seeds.
We need to order more <w>TTC</w> for the biology laboratory.
